Delightful User(Client) App

User App of Flutter on-demand home services app with complete solution is the primary interfaces that your end clients will use to browse services, book Handyman, make payments and more.

Buy Now
View Plan
★★★★★ 5/5
#1 Handyman App

How it works

Customer Experience Simplified

Here's a quick overview video of User App to show how easy it is to use.

User interface

Beautiful Designed UI

Functional, well-designed user interface to ensure your users have a delightful experience.

Features

Discover What’s Possible With User App.

This is the most frequently used App by your clients to engage with your services, book a handyman, and pay.

User Time Slot

Customers can choose an available and convenient time slot for their service.

Post Job Request

In case user didn't find a relevant service then they can post a open job request.

Explore Service Categories

Access Multiple service categories and sub-categories to choose from.

Book a Service

Users can book a service for their selected date and time.

Multiple Payment Gateways

Support for multiple payment methods like COD, Razorpay, Stripe & many more.

Discount Coupon

Handyman Home Service App offers coupons to help users to avail Discounts.

Chat with Handyman

User can chat with handyman & provider to get quick information and solve queries.

Booking History

User can view his/her booking history with status filter.

Location Based Service

User can search and select Nearby Provider services on their app easily.

Service Completion Proof

User can see the service completion proof uploaded by handyman.

Push Notification

Users get important notifications and alerts directly on their App.

Search Filter

User can search services by keywords & filter by provider, category and price.

Get Service Detail

The Service Detail page show all the necessary information about a service.

Check Provider Profile

Users can check full profile of provider before booking their service.

Rate & Reviews

Ability to View and provide feedback for services your user purchased.

rated 4.7 out of 5

Hear What Customers Say About Handyman

Our customers around the globe have openly shown love for the product and our customer service.

Download Demo App to Experience It
